data.title: Hasan Ma'juni • FlixPatrol
data.meta_description: Mohammad Hassan Madjooni is Iranian an television actor and theater director born in Zanjan, Iran. He is a graduate of Theatrical Literature. Hassan Mahjuni is also the head of the Liu Theater Group. He has also starred in The Traveler series directed by Rambod Javan, as well as the candlelight…
data.text: Numbers represent the title popularity measured on streaming. Every day, we track the popularity of movies and TV shows on Netflix, HBO Max, Disney+, Amazon Prime Video, Paramount+, and other streaming services in more than 160 countries worldwide. Viewership by hours or accounts is not provided, so we use the rankings from TOP 10 and other popularity charts, and from that, we build the point system for tracking the changes. See more about how the points and numbers are calculated.
